title: Access Analytics
creator: Level Access
description: Access Analytics is a JavaScript package that continuously monitors websites and applications for accessibility-related data by testing upon page load each time a unique user visits. This intelligently informs accessibility initiatives by providing key insights into violation patterns.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
